thread.title: An Woo Yeon Is The Latest Addition For Cast Of Upcoming Sci-Fi Drama
thread.title_full: An Woo Yeon Is The Latest Addition For Cast Of Upcoming Sci-Fi Drama

author: christinaoh21
title: An Woo Yeon Is The Latest Addition For Cast Of Upcoming Sci-Fi Drama
text:
Pin   
Another actor has been added to the cast of the upcoming tvN drama “Circle: Two Worlds Connected” (tentative title). 
Reports confirmed that actor An Woo Yeon , who is currently playing the role of Do Bong Soon’s younger brother in JTBC’s “ Strong Woman Do Bong Soon ,” will be joining the cast for the new sci-fi drama. 
He will be taking on the role of Woo Jin’s twin brother and will appear in part one of the drama, which takes place in the year 2017, alongside actor Yeo Jin Goo . An Woo Yeon ’s character is obsessed with aliens and brings about chaos wherever he goes. This role will be a complete 180 degree transformation from his previous roles and is expected to be a turning point in the rookie actor’s career. 
“Circle: Two Worlds Connected” will take place in both the present year of 2017 and in the future in 2037. Woo Jin, who will be played by Yeo Jin Goo, is a college student who follows a strange, potentially alien-related incident that occurs in 2017 while Jun Hyuk, who will be played by Kim Kang Woo , is a passionate homicide detective who investigates a similar occurrence in the year 2037. The drama will follow the two characters as they unravel the truth behind the mysterious happenings in both the present and future. 
So far, Yeo Jin Goo, Kim Kang Woo, Gong Seung Yeon , and Highlight’s Lee Gi Kwang have been confirmed for the tvN drama, which is set to air this May.
